IOL after PPROM (at 34 weeks) 
• PPROM is managed conservatively provided there is no evidence of amnionitis (see chapter on problems i n
pr
egnancy)
• When IOL is needed follow the same procedures as above, including the use of foley catheter with antibiotic
cover.
IOL in a scarred uterus 
• Misoprostol should not be used with a scarred uterus beyond 24 weeks (discuss with a specialist first).
• The method of choice is F
